original_text: Then Ehud went out into the porch and closed the doors of the roof chamber behind him and locked them.
korean_text: 에훗이 현관에 나와서 다락문들을 뒤에서 닫아 잠그니라

sentences.original_text: Then Ehud went out into the porch
and closed the doors of the roof chamber behind him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자신의 뒤에 다락방 문들을 닫았습니다.
